user.title: WyreStorm NetworkHD Controller
user.description: Enter the SSH connection details for your WyreStorm NetworkHD controller. This integration connects to the controller over SSH to manage your matrix switching system.

data_description.host: The IP address of your WyreStorm NetworkHD controller
data_description.username: SSH username for the controller (default: wyrestorm)
data_description.password: SSH password for the controller (default: networkhd)
data_description.update_interval: How often to poll for device status updates (10-300 seconds)

error.invalid_auth: Invalid SSH credentials. Please check your username and password.
error.timeout: Connection timed out. Please check the controller is powered on and accessible.
error.host_key_verification_failed: SSH host key verification failed. Please check the controller's network configuration and try again.

abort.already_configured: A WyreStorm NetworkHD Controller with this IP address is already configured.
